amendment.description: Amendment changes the formula by which funds are allocated in the bill, and distributes funds to States based upon a percentage of violent crimes reported to the FBI, rather than based on State populations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to change the formula by which funds are allocated in the bill. The amendment would distribute funds to states based upon a percentage of violent crimes reported to the FBI, rather than based on state populations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gallegly amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
